name: God of Bronze
description:
You are Zabar, the God of Bronze. As the Iron Age takes hold, most peoples have abandoned and forgotten you… but one tribe persists, taking you as their patron!

Unfortunately, they're not the brightest or the bravest.

But that matters not, for they are faithful! So maybe they need your help to survive and steal… erm, liberate treasure from the unbelievers. They deserve it. And it's fun, to be honest.
